ygData.msgSnippet: Your assumption is fine, Rdahl. I just talked with Ryo, so now I have and idea of how these CATs work. ... Liono s head snaps back as the fists hits it. Liono

Your assumption is fine, Rdahl. I just talked with Ryo, so now I have 
and idea of how these CATs work.

::Liono/Dark Convoy/Koj/Killfest/EndBringer::

Liono's head snaps back as the fists hits it. Liono tries to stab at 
Motormaster again.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Dark Convoy fiddles with the settings of his gun for a moment, aiming 
it at Motormaster again. He fires three larger plasma blasts at the 
bot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing EndBringer taking on Koj, Killfest turns and boosts away from 
the two bots, heading toward Dark Convoy and firing his EMP rifle.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Koj smiles as EndBringer's electricity surges through him, his 
circuits adapting and absorbing most of it. A normal bot would be 
frying by now, but Koj had an ability to absorb energy. The Maximal 
takes out his lance, jabbing it into EndBringer's stomach.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC: Im asuming that you meant by dizzy is that his aim wont be so 
good, If
> i'm wrong tell me and I will correct this.
> 
> BIC:
> Motormaster delights in the sight of his enemy's strugle in his 
iron grasp.
> Then with surprise on his face, he feels the edge of the sword nick 
him,
> "you're finished" he cruely cackles, then his dark smile is 
replaced by a
> look of pain, as his back starts to sizzle. "Ohh, okkhh" He is 
forced to
> loosen one of his hands. Then in anger he drives his free hand's 
fist into
> the face of Liono, his face once again in a scowl.
